# 8.0 Docs

> Documentation for 8.0 Docs.

- [Breaking change: New non-root 'app' user in Linux images](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/containers/8.0/app-user.md): Learn about the breaking change in containers where a new non-root 'app' user was added in Linux container images.
- [Breaking change: Default ASP.NET Core port changed from 80 to 8080](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/containers/8.0/aspnet-port.md): Learn about the breaking change in containers where the default ASP.NET Core port changed from 80 to 8080.
- [Breaking change: 'ca-certificates' package removed from Alpine images](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/containers/8.0/ca-certificates-package.md): Learn about the breaking change in containers where the 'ca-certificates' package was removed from Alpine container images.
- [Breaking change: Debian container images upgraded to Debian 12](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/containers/8.0/debian-version.md): Learn about the breaking change in containers where .NET container images for Linux have been upgraded to Debian 12 (Bookworm).
- [Kerberos package removed from Alpine and Debian images](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/containers/8.0/krb5-libs-package.md): Learn about the breaking change in containers where the 'krb5-libs' package was removed from .NET container images.
- [Breaking change: 'libintl' package removed from Alpine images](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/containers/8.0/libintl-package.md): Learn about the breaking change in containers where the 'libintl' package was removed from Alpine container images.
- [Breaking change: Multi-platform container tags are Linux-only](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/containers/8.0/multi-platform-tags.md): Learn about the breaking change in containers where multi-platform container tags are now Linux-only.
